changes.description: Use base_price for blueprint originals for accurate valuation
Add visible button for directors to add corporation
Add asset view settings modal for customization
Display contract items and sell orders in assets tree
Add structure value calculation with fitted items
Add corporation roles tracking and dynamic corp management
Add EVE Est column and regional pricing comparison
Fetch implant slots from ref API for accurate clone data
Show Unknown Parent for items with missing parent containers
Resolve starbase locations using moon names instead of ESI
Keep dropdown visible when no orders match filter
Fix asset list not refreshing on owner removal
Parallelize reference data loading for faster startup
Defer display name resolution to render time
Add centralized store registry for owner lifecycle management
Production readiness improvements with cache limits and cleanup
